title: Draftsman's errors, which are required to be corrected as per actual situation on site / or as per Survey Records, sanctioned layout etc
clause_text: Draftsman's errors, which are required to be corrected as per actual situation on site / or as per Survey Records, sanctioned layout etc. shall be corrected by the concerned District Collector, after due verification and prior approval of concerned Divisional joint Director of Town Planning.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
